content.raw: We use a custom costmap for our navigation which has worked well for quite some time, but since roughly yesterdays package updates move\_base has been trying to resize it which it doesn’t support, sometimes the sizes are very odd as well \(eg. 30m x 5m\). I’ve specified the size/resolution it needs to be in all of the config files but it will still try to resize the layer. Has something changed in the way move\_base works that would cause this? Is there a config setting I’m unaware of that will turn off resizing?
